lesson_snapshot.title: Introduction to Fractions
lesson_snapshot.description: Learn about numerators, denominators, and basic fraction operations
objectives: Understand what numerators and denominators represent

cards.title: Understanding Fractions
cards.explainer: A fraction shows parts of a whole. The number on top is the numerator (parts we have), and the number on bottom is the denominator (total parts).
cards.content: Let's explore what 2/10 means and how we can simplify it.

cfu.question: What is 2/10 simplified to its lowest terms?
hints: Both 2 and 10 can be divided by 2

cards.title: Comparing Fractions
cards.explainer: To compare fractions, we can convert them to have the same denominator or convert them to decimals.
cards.content: Let's compare 3/4 and 2/3 to see which is larger.
